ctx_a: [header] How to thicken frosting [title] Add more powdered sugar. [step] Most frostings contain powdered sugar, and the most common way to thicken a runny frosting is by gradually mixing in a bit more powdered sugar to offset the liquid ingredients. [substeps] Only add the sugar a little at a time.
ctx: [header] How to thicken frosting [title] Add more powdered sugar. [step] Most frostings contain powdered sugar, and the most common way to thicken a runny frosting is by gradually mixing in a bit more powdered sugar to offset the liquid ingredients. [substeps] Only add the sugar a little at a time.
endings: Where required, spoon additional powdered sugar into the mixture until you reach the desired consistency, if it isn't already runny. The consistency will have a little crunch to it when you first add the frosting to thicken it in recipes.
Sprinkle an additional 1 to 2 tbsp (15 to 30 ml) into the frosting and mix well. If you add too much at once, the frosting will become too sweet and may become too thick.

Just a little at a time, or you won't get the flavors mixed properly. You want the frosting thickened to the consistency of conventional condiments, but the actual texture of the frosting should be somewhere between flat and thick.
If you add in too much added sugar, you won't be able to firm the frosting enough to thicken it properly. If you pour in a little more powdered sugar to balance the thickening liquid, add less sugar.

ctx: [header] How to set up a restroom trailer [title] Choose an appropriate size. [step] The size of the trailer you will need will be determined by the number of estimated people who will attend the event, how long the event will run and whether food and beverages will be served. Restroom trailers are normally sized in terms of number of " stations ".
endings: This is the number of toilets and urinals that can be used at the same time. For example if a restroom trailer has 4 toilet stalls for both males and females and 2 urinals this would be a 6 " station " restroom trailer.

[substeps] To assess the size of the trailer, estimate the cfr based on your budget and basic needs. Many trailers are broadcast under the proper times of day, as will turn off the lights (or get lights switched off) to allow for more light.

Most facilities should be built up to the nearest station, on the left side of the vehicle, set into the trailer. A large number of facilities can accommodate more, but smaller facilities have more locations and are similar in size.

The larger the station, the more people your audience will have to eat. As for gender, you may need anywhere between 36 to 70 people in most vehicles, and you don't have to space them out with as many smaller ones as you might in vehicles.

ctx: [header] How to make a windsock for children [title] Decorate a sheet of paper with markers, crayons, paint, or stickers. [step] Get out a sheet of construction paper, printer paper, or cardstock. Set it down on a flat surface, then decorate it to your heart's content.
endings: [substeps] Crayons can be customized or made for kids, but any size would work. Choose a color that will complement the child's face and body.
If you use paint, be sure to let the paint dry. [substeps] Make spots or stripes for a simple design.
You can paint the paper white, let it dry for a day, or color it with crayons or watercolors. Once everything dries, write a description about your windsock by hand or add a sticker.

Pick up crayons or cards, markers or stickers that you can paint into a decorative shape, or pieces of cardstock that can go in a flag shape. Create the flag with a piece of cardstock, so that it stands out.

ctx_a: [header] How to reduce inflammation [title] Replace refined carbohydrates with healthier carbohydrates. [step] Refined carbohydrates, like white bread and pastries, have high amounts of sugar and low amounts of fiber. This can spike blood sugar levels, which can lead to weight gain and increased inflammation.
ctx: [header] How to reduce inflammation [title] Replace refined carbohydrates with healthier carbohydrates. [step] Refined carbohydrates, like white bread and pastries, have high amounts of sugar and low amounts of fiber. This can spike blood sugar levels, which can lead to weight gain and increased inflammation.
endings: This can limit the natural flow of fiber to the body, which aids in reducing inflammation. Skip high-fiber choices when you can.
Good carbohydrates to eat have high amounts of fiber and little added sugar, such as fruits and whole grain products. [title] Cut down on sugary foods and beverages.

Try to incorporate vegetables into your diet for longer-term benefits. [substeps] Fresh green vegetables are an excellent source of whole, unprocessed carbohydrates-any type that are fresh and unprocessed doesn't count.
[substeps] When you use packaged sugar free carbohydrates, use syrups. You don't have to buy whole whole whole fat carbohydrates like corn syrup, wheat flour, or whole milk.

endings: [title] Mix equal parts dishwashing soap and water in a spray bottle. [step] For many dishes, adding a little liquid at a time can do wonders.
Pump in a squirt of dishwashing soap for a solution best for where you are cleaning. Spray it onto the handles and hold them in place for a few minutes before rinsing them.
If you prefer bleach, start with a gallon of water. Add a tablespoon of bleach to it, and mix it up.
Finally, use the key-head of a hairdryer to disperse the vinegar. [substeps] If vinegar doesn't work, you may use fabric softener instead.

[step] Giving your cat food at meal times is important. In most cases it will not look for the trash, so if you offer to feed it anything, it will be more inclined to do it at meal time.

ctx_a: [header] How to dress when you are fat [title] Know what designs work best. [step] Avoid horizontal stripes and excessive patterns. These will draw unwanted attention to your body that you may be trying to avoid.
ctx: [header] How to dress when you are fat [title] Know what designs work best. [step] Avoid horizontal stripes and excessive patterns. These will draw unwanted attention to your body that you may be trying to avoid.
endings: Avoid colors that emphasize a certain area of your body, like red or black because they'll draw more attention to your body. [substeps] You also want to avoid patterns and bold prints.
Stylists and cosplayers should avoid large patterns that might attract attention. Instead, focus on design that draws attention to your body.
Try a down or baggy style or a rectangle style style. Make sure your design does not require a lower waist.
Solid colors are a safer choice if you want to appear slimmer. [substeps] The tried and true rule is that black is generally very slimming and flattering.

endings: Include the number of meals and snacks you went through recently, your new habits and what you had your last meal for lunch and dinner. [substeps] Write down who you were with or with the day before.
Break these down into small, daily goals. [substeps] For example, you may have a set goal of to lose 2 pounds per week.
The biggest focus is to replace those unhealthy habits with healthier ones. These habits can be quick fixes for overall weight loss.
Include your daily schedule so that you can see how much activity you do. You can start recording this a week before your diet, or you can recall it from memory.

ctx_a: [header] How to buy home appliances online [title] Take measurements of the appliance space. [step] This method is helpful if you are buying a large appliance that must fit properly into its intended space; such as a washer, dryer, stove, or refrigerator. [substeps] Use a measuring tape to measure the width, height, and depth of the space for the appliance in your home.
ctx: [header] How to buy home appliances online [title] Take measurements of the appliance space. [step] This method is helpful if you are buying a large appliance that must fit properly into its intended space; such as a washer, dryer, stove, or refrigerator. [substeps] Use a measuring tape to measure the width, height, and depth of the space for the appliance in your home.
endings: Each measurement should be 4 inches (10 cm). It is also useful for sizing large appliance models that need to be tightly sealed with varnish.

Enter the measurements into a notebook, which you can refer to later when you browse online for appliances. Most websites will provide you with accurate measurements for each appliance featured on their site.
This will give you a sense of how wide and tall the appliance must be. [title] Purchase a pre-existing appliance, such as a refrigerator or cabinet.
If possible, use a tape measure and record the measurement into a measuring tape. [title] Account for every inch of space to fit the appliance when looking at it from the front side.
